Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1984...
Injured on 5/24/1984 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Hugh Ly (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/1985, off James Carino (CC)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Syracuse on 9/18/1986...
Injured on 6/15/1987 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had 7 hits with 7 RBI against Northeastern on 8/16/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1990, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Manchester on 8/27/1990...
Injured on 9/15/1991 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Columbus on 9/19/1992...
